Os Killers apesar de serem meio desbalanceados (alguns) como o Michael e o Ghost Face, o jogo √© muito divertido e tenso de jogar com os amigos, √© uma gritaria, risada e essas coisas, me divirto muito jogando, recomendo.
I farted so loud it made my grandma fall off her bed and die.

Ever scream at the screen and tell them not to go in there?
Well... now you control the action.

If that action is flipping switches on generators, jumping over fallen pallets and through windows... and eventually through really loud doors to escape killers - then this game is for you!

This game still gets my heart racing. Playing both killer and survivor, it can be quite exhilarating during a fun chase. Don't take the game too seriously, hitboxes can be bs depending on connections. Certain perks/builds are not balanced for casual play. So focus on playing for fun and how you like to. 
Survivors: More Headons and less deadhards.
BHVR, please buff ghosty. <3
The community is toxic. An enjoyable game to kill time

Use to be fun back in 2018-2020. But now it feels like every match is full on try hard to have fun. There are some funny moments where everyone in the match doesn't try so hard, but those moments are very few in supply. 

- New maps that came out/ revised are blindingly bright compared to the horror atmosphere back in 2020 and further. 
- Very toxic game sometimes
- Addictive and Rage inducing
- Teamwork game, so if you got bad teammates good luck
- DLCs get pretty expensive so you can have meta/good perks and killers

Overall the game was addictive with friends and without friends because of the adrenaline, strategy, and teamwork. But that doesn't mean the game was good. Do not recommend.
Are you supposed to have fun here?

Never buy this game again. It's extremely unbalanced. Although it's a long time late, most of it is still in the past. The newer the version is, the more unbalanced it is. A game can be completed in 5 minutes. 40 seconds. A machine can be repaired quickly. A total of 5 butchers can play with it. It can hardly 4 kill novices. Human reversal is unbalanced. Human beings are harder than butchers. I don't know who is a butcher

Honestly, this is one of those games that you love and despise, it goes hand in hand. There are so many fun aspects of the game, and the concept is great, and the dlc's are cool. But games like these always have balancing problems and you are guaranteed at least one rage quit, but that's just part of the package lol.

Personally the pros out weigh the cons for me, i've been playing this game for a few years, i bought it on three different consoles. No matter how much i hate it i can't stop playing it lol.
Fun game when solo but even better when you have friends playing as well.
